name: 4-Hour Forex VHF Trend Follower
description: Intermediate-complexity trend-following system for liquid FX majors on 4-hour bars. It uses a Vertical Horizontal Filter to detect trending regimes (>0.2), confirms momentum with RSI(14) thresholds, sizes positions to risk 2 % of equity, and protects capital with an ATR-based trailing stop. No fixed profit target; trades exit on trend deterioration (VHF <0.15) or the dynamic stop.
